data.title: SANUS VIWLF128
data.meta_description: The VIWLF128-B2 Large In-Wall Full Motion mount provides the optimal viewing experience with space for AV components built in. This full motion mount extends 28" with up to 67° of swivel left and right and sits just .5" from the wall when recessed. Mount arms fold into a 20" enclosure that can double as AV storage for streaming devices, switches and more. With knockouts to add power (not included) and cable management, The VIWLF128 offers a stylish industrial design that achieves the ultimate all-in-one AV experience. For TVs 42"-85"
data.text:
Premium Large In-Wall Full-Motion Mount for TVs 42"-85"

VIWLF128

This product has been discontinued.

Fits TVs 42" - 85"

Swivel 67° / -67°

Extension 28.00"

$349.00 USD

Ready to install your Mount?

Use the HeightFinder for mounting instructions. Go to HeightFinder

Videos to Get You Started

SANUS VIWLF128 Installation Video

Premium Large In-Wall Full-Motion Mount for TVs 42"-85"

The VIWLF128-B2 Large In-Wall Full Motion mount provides the optimal viewing experience with space for AV components built in. This full motion mount extends 28" with up to 67° of swivel left and right and sits just .5" from the wall when recessed. Mount arms fold into a 20" enclosure that can double as AV storage for streaming devices, switches and more. With knockouts to add power (not included) and cable management, The VIWLF128 offers a stylish industrial design that achieves the ultimate all-in-one AV experience. For TVs 42"-85"

Product Features

In-wall box fits between two 16" on center studs

28" of extension for maximum swivel on larger TVs

Sits just .5" from the wall when recessed

Virtual Axis™ finger-tip tilt to reduce glare

Swivels up to 67° left and right* for the perfect viewing angle *with 65" TV

Six attachment slots with included velcro to secure components

Click-lock mechanism securely locks TV into wall plate

Awards

CEPro Best Product Award 2023

Residential Tech 2023 Innovation Award

TWICE Best of Show 2023

Residential Systems Best of Show 2023

The Details

Product Brand: SANUS Model Code: VIWLF128 UPC Code: 793795538741 - Black - $349.00 USD

Product Width: 24.90" / 63.25cm Product Height: 20.80" / 52.83cm Product Depth: 28.00" / 71.12cm

TV Size Range: 42" - 85" / 106.68cm - 215.90cm Maximum TV Weight: 135lbs / 61.23kg Universal Mounting: Yes | 100 x 100 through 600 x 400 i

Universal Mounting

VESA patterns are measured by the center of one mounting hole to the center of another on the back of a television in millimeters. In the example above, the VESA measurements are 100 (width) x 100 (height). The example TV would be able to use a VESA 100 x 100 mount.

Supported VESA Patterns Tilt: 4° / -10° Swivel: 67° / -67°

SANUS is the #1 best-selling TV mount brand in the U.S.*
